description: Structured information describing the contact point of an electrode.

contactPoint._instruction: Add the central coordinate of this contact point of interest.

definedIn._instruction: Add one or several file(s) in which the electrode contact is defined in.

identifier._instruction: Enter an unqiue identifier of this electrode contact.

relatedRecordings._instruction: Add one or several file(s) in which the recorded data from this electrode contact were stored.

relatedStimulations._instruction: Add one or several file(s) in which the stimulation of this electrode contact were stored.

visualizedIn._instruction: Add one or several image(s) in which the electrode contact is visualized in.
